class.name: ORMMaterial3D
class.brief_description: A PBR (Physically Based Rendering) material to be used on 3D objects. Uses an ORM texture.
class.description: ORMMaterial3D's properties are inherited from [BaseMaterial3D]. Unlike [StandardMaterial3D], ORMMaterial3D uses a single texture for ambient occlusion, roughness and metallic maps, known as an ORM texture.
